The Celtic pre-season schedule got properly underway on Wednesday as the team faced Yokohama F. Marinos. The match at the Nissan Stadium was an enjoyable one even if Brendan Rodgers‘ side lost 6-4. After a couple of low-profile matches in Portugal it was particularly nice to see the team back in action. The game was ...
The post Celtic announce positive television arrangements for the rest of pre-season appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Celtic announce positive television arrangements for the rest of pre-season

articles.author: Patrick Sinat
articles.description:
The appointment of Brendan Rodgers was one of the worst-kept secrets in Scottish football. If you had asked anyone prior to this season about the likelihood of the Irishman returning to Celtic just five years after his departure to Leicester City, you would have been laughed out of Glasgow. We all know the backstory as ...
The post Callum McGregor's meeting with Brendan Rodgers; the moment he knew Celtic return was serious appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Callum McGregor's meeting with Brendan Rodgers; the moment he knew Celtic return was serious

articles.author: Hamish Carton
articles.description:
Peter Grant reckons that Brendan Rodgers is already impressed with some of the Celtic young stars. The former Hoops hero was on co-commentary duty during Wednesday’s 6-4 defeat at the hands of Yokohama F. Marinos. Rodgers started with a strong line-up at the Nissan Stadium, but gave second-half opportunities to several young prospects. The likes ...
The post Peter Grant reckons that group of Celtic stars have made an impression on Rodgers appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Peter Grant reckons that group of Celtic stars have made an impression on Rodgers

articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
Celtic fans continue their Japanese adventure after yesterdays 6-4 defeat to Yokahoma. They will now start make the 500k journey to Osaka on the famous bullet train for the Gamba Game. Yokohama F. Marinos and Celtic fans had plenty to cheer with the ball hitting the back of the net 10 times. The J. League […]
